author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Qualys Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.32
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Qualys Inc:
* QUALYS ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.32
* SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.32 TO $0.34
* SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.71 TO $0.76 * SEES Q1 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.13 TO $0.15 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.07 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $275.5 MILLION TO $278.5 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $63.4 MILLION TO $64.1 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP 19 TO 21 PERCENT * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE UP 19 TO 21 PERCENT * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.39 TO $1.44
* SAYS ANNOUNCES $100 MILLION 2-YEAR SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.28, REVENUE VIEW $62.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.26, REVENUE VIEW $62.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.19, REVENUE VIEW $267.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
